params.name: activity_type
params.replaces: AND ((type = 'PullRequestEvent' AND action = 'opened') OR (type = 'IssuesEvent' AND action = 'opened') OR (type = 'IssueCommentEvent' AND action = 'created') OR (type = 'PullRequestReviewEvent' AND action = 'created') OR (type = 'PullRequestReviewCommentEvent' AND action = 'created') OR (type = 'PushEvent' AND action = ''))

template.all: AND ((type = 'PullRequestEvent' AND action = 'opened') OR (type = 'IssuesEvent' AND action = 'opened') OR (type = 'IssueCommentEvent' AND action = 'created') OR (type = 'PullRequestReviewEvent' AND action = 'created') OR (type = 'PullRequestReviewCommentEvent' AND action = 'created') OR (type = 'PushEvent' AND action = ''))

params.name: time_range
params.replaces: AND (created_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 28 DAY) AND NOW())

template.last_72_hours: AND (created_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 72 HOUR) AND NOW())
template.last_7_days: AND (created_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) AND NOW())
template.last_28_days: AND (created_at BETWEEN DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 28 DAY) AND NOW())
